full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SHES RAB SNYING PO'I MDOS KYIS GZHIR BYAS PA'I BCOS THABS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011B SHES RAB SNYING PO'I MDOS KYIS GZHIR BYAS PA'I BCOS THABS NI, KHRI GDAN SER PO'I STENG DU RGYAL PO 'KHOR BCAS THAMS CAD BSHAMS NA, 'DI PHYI ROL TU RAS SER PAS RVA BSKOR BYA, ZUR BZHI LA BA DAN RGYAL MTSAN SOGS BSHAMS, , 'DON BYA LA MDOS GZHAN GYIS GZHIR BYAS LA, GUGS BZHUGS BYIN RLABS LAM STON KHA BSGYUR SOGS BRGYAN LA LHAN THABS BYA'O, ,NYES SKYON MI 'BYUNG BAR GSUNGS SO,, ,,
